definition: to sever, i.e. ransom; gener. to release, preserve
kjvTranslation: [idiom] at all, deliver, [idiom] by any means, ransom, (that are to be, let be) redeem(-ed), rescue, [idiom] surely.

translations.bg: да се откъсне, т.е. да се откупи; gen. to release, preserve
translations.cs: oddělit, tj. vykoupit; gen. propustit, zachovat
translations.da: at adskille, dvs. løsepenge; gener. at frigive, bevare
translations.de: abtrennen, d.h. auslösen; allgemein: freilassen, bewahren
translations.el: αποκόπτω, δηλ. λύτρα- γεν. απελευθερώνω, διατηρώ
translations.es: cortar, es decir, rescatar; gener. liberar, preservar
translations.et: eraldada, st lunaraha; üldnimetus vabastama, säilitama
translations.fi: katkaista, eli lunnaita; yleisk. vapauttaa, säilyttää
translations.fr: séparer, c'est-à-dire rançonner ; génériquement, libérer, préserver
translations.hu: elválasztani, azaz váltságdíjat fizetni; gener. felszabadítani, megőrizni
translations.id: memutuskan, yaitu tebusan; gener. melepaskan, melestarikan
translations.it: recidere, cioè riscattare; gener. rilasciare, preservare
translations.ja: 切断する、すなわち身代金を得る。
translations.ko: 끊다, 즉 몸값; 생성하다, 방출하다, 보존하다
translations.lt: atplėšti, t. y. išpirkti; bendr. išlaisvinti, išsaugoti
translations.lv: atdalīt, t.i., izpirkt; ģen. atbrīvot, saglabāt
translations.nb: å skille, dvs. løse løsepenger; gener. å frigjøre, bevare
translations.nl: lossnijden, d.w.z. losgeld; gener. vrijlaten, behouden
translations.pl: odciąć, tj. okupować; gener. uwolnić, zachować
translations.pt: cortar, ou seja, resgatar; gener. libertar, preservar
translations.ro: a tăia, adică a răscumpăra; gener. a elibera, a păstra
translations.ru: разрывать, т.е. выкупать; род. п. освобождать, сохранять
translations.sk: oddeliť, t. j. vykúpiť; gener. uvoľniť, zachovať
translations.sl: ločiti, tj. odkupiti; gener. izpustiti, ohraniti
translations.sv: att skära av, dvs. lösa ut; gener. att släppa, bevara
translations.tr: koparmak, yani fidye; genel. serbest bırakmak, korumak
translations.uk: розірвати, тобто викупити; род. звільнити, зберегти
translations.zh: 斷，即贖金；泛指釋放、保全
